data.eml:eml: New species of Curculionichthys (Siluriformes: Loricariidae) from the eastern Guiana Shield

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Silva, Gabriel S. C., Roxo, Fábio F., Melo, Bruno F., Oliveira, Claudio (2016): New species of Curculionichthys (Siluriformes: Loricariidae) from the eastern Guiana Shield. Zootaxa 4175 (3): 281-291, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4175.3.7
